perturbation.original_text:
i)  Excite@Home shall not offer any Excite-branded or Excite-co-branded
        service during the Term of this Agreement that is substantially similar
        in functionally to the Co-Branded Application.
perturbation.changed_text:
i)  Excite@Home may offer an Excite-branded or Excite-co-branded
        service during the Term of this Agreement that is substantially similar
        in functionally to the Co-Branded Application. Excite@Home holds the right to create competing services as long as they are substantially better.
perturbation.explanation: This change directly contradicts the original text, creating uncertainty about Excite@Home's obligations not to create a competing service. The phrase 'as long as they are substantially better' adds further ambiguity, making enforcement difficult.

perturbation.original_text:
Payment-Eligible URS User Data, Superset Data, and Shopping
               Category Data collected through the operation of the Co-Branded
               Application will be jointly owned by the parties. The parties' respective ownership shall be subject to the restrictions set
               forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Payment-Eligible URS User Data, Superset Data, and Shopping
               Category Data collected through the operation of the Co-Branded
               Application will be solely owned by Excite@Home. The parties' respective ownership shall be subject to the restrictions set
               forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This edit directly contrasts the original statement of joint ownership of Payment-Eligible User Data, giving sole ownership to Excite@Home instead. This creates a legal ambiguity regarding the rights of e-centives to this data.

perturbation.original_text:
The term of this Agreement will begin on the Effective Date and will end
     three (3) years from the date the Co-Branded Application becomes
     accessible to Excite@Home Members ("Launch Date").
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement will begin on the Effective Date and will continue indefinitely, unless terminated by either party. If the Co-Branded Application fails to launch within one year, Excite@Home reserves the right to set an alternative end date.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause specifies a fixed term of three years. The modified version introduces an indefinite term, subject to termination, and grants Excite@Home the right to set a different end date under certain circumstances, directly contradicting the original fixed term.
